page.title: 15StJohn Baptist Parish Church
page.content: Position : A6 North of the roundabout. A church has stood on this site for over 800 years. The first churches were made of wood. The present church has a tower dating from 1533 but the main part of the church was built in the 1820's, with parts added to it later. SAXON FONT - the font was returned to the church in the 1880's. It had a cover at one time to prevent people stealing the holy water. STOCKS - the old stocks outside the church were erected in 1902 but not on the original site. CHEST - An old blackened chest in the church holds parchments dating back to Henry IV. the chest dates back to 1666. CHURCH RECORDS - date back to 1600's.
